via Imgflip Meme Maker

how the hell did you manage that many parts and only 270t?

how the hell did you manage that many parts and only 270t?

same way i made a 15 ton ship 270 parts... lots of tiny peices....

how the hell did you manage that many parts and only 270t?

1215 cubic struts?

another image of my now scrapped mega carrier design.

That's 34 fighters you see in there.

Its quite the lag fest no way I could use it in combat.

OK, just woke up so sorry about the wait. Here's what has happened in the battle so far:

Needle 1 Launched all three of his torpedoes, the first missed, and the second glanced off the P.M.S McDonald without leaving a scratch. After some maneuvering, the third torpedo was launched from a greater range and a more favorable position. The damage dealt:

In this photo you can see that an engine block was destroyed.

And in this photo, you can see some of the armoring was also knocked off.

"Needle 1, preparing for Duna re-entry."

Persist

Maybe We should all do a really big battle at the Jool system?

Also, I think this idea is great. If we separated the combatants into two teams, and each team member brought 1 or 2 ships (if more than one, one ship should be a fighter, another should be a frigate/cruiser) it would work well I think..

Just my 2 cents.

While everyone else is muddling about in 5-10 ton tanks, Meet the new KingPanzerZ. With Four Super Heavy Missiles, 64 tons, 499 parts (woohoo!). Can cream a battleship from 10KM away, the ship wouldn't even have the range to respond.

Edited November 29, 2013 by zekes

I took the advantage of having my fighter still alive to turn the tides...

My first two missiles missed but my third hit causing small amounts of damage but sent the needle spinning and ripping it apart. with my fourth barrage of missiles I took shot of the needles remaining missiles. The P.M.S. mcdonalds is out of the game and so is the first needle and the second needle is severely disabled. (you are lucky to have taken out my anti everything missile as they are lethal as Mr. Tegu should know.)

http://panfish5.imgur.com/

Also how do I upload an imgur album?

Its really easy, just go to imgur.com, and click "Computer" under upload images on the top right. Then choose the image you want and then there should be a window that pops up allowing you to do various things, one of which is "create album". Then just provide the link.

Also, DAMNIT I wanted to use one of those on your bigger ships

I'll take my turn in a sec.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36010-Introducing-the-Ability-to-Embed-Imgur-Albums!

Edited November 29, 2013 by panfish5

And the results of the beginning of the second round are in! Since my two fighters were disabled, I decided to de-orbit them (hope that's ok, they were out of the fight anyway and there was no reason to attack them). I attacked your P.M.S Big Mac with my first Scythe. The first Medium smart torpedo glanced off the double plate without a scratch, the second (somehow) detached all of your weaponry from the inside. Both shots landed on the broadside of your armor, so I'm assuming the first shot broke some of the struts inside, the second just finished the deal. So while that ship is not disabled, I don't think you can use its weaponry anymore. I next tried using the SRB's, but unfortunately (having never shot them off until now) they both missed...

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Also, you are fighting an army of Bob and Bill Kerman's haha.

Persist

Ok sorry for the wait had to go do some stuff but I got my turn done. I beleive I won because the first scythe has no more weapons left that i could find and ramming is disallowed and I just killed the second scythe.

(I'm not gonna bother with a gallery and the images are bigger too.)

Setting up the manuever.

Target located.

WRONG BUTTON!!!

That was a close one but I realign and fire again.

I knocked of the engines but I come in closer for the kill.

And I great hit with an obvious kill.

Persist if you have any weapons left but I'm sure you're out of luck. https://www./?43bixr0zrg8qf2q
panfish if that battle's over, would you like a rematch? I have new, shiny shredder missiles...

panfish if that battle's over, would you like a rematch? I have new, shiny shredder missiles...

Ya I could try another battle... I've got to polish up the frigate Mk 2 (not the official name) and make some new fighters. Ive also been thinking about basing a carrier of my giant space shuttle.
awesome! How about 400 tons/ five ships? And like somewhere exotic like Minmus?
Ah good game. I need ships with some bigger tonnage/better armoring, your armoring was just too good on the big ships

@Zekes sure that would be good place (maybe we could battle at Moho I don't think there has been a battle there yet) you can start working on a persist while I polish up my New frigate.

@Stinger ya that was a close game I thought I was gonna lose at first. Trust me I got a whoopin on my first two games (first one was actually kinda close until I lost all my anti-everything missiles.) Keep building your ships you may end up like zekes someday!

@Zekes sure that would be good place (maybe we could battle at Moho I don't think there has been a battle there yet) you can start working on a persist while I polish up my New frigate.
